name: Blight in the Garden
description:
Blight in the Garden

Weekly Game Jam 97 Submission - Strange Garden

My latest game-jam submission. It was a little more ambitious than I had time for, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless. Expect bugs and game balance issues. Be sure to read the instructions at the start, as they are essential for understanding what to do.

Basic Controls:

[Any Key] to advance text.

[Arrow Keys] to move and jump.

[V] To interact (Pickup, drop, take from seedling box, activate fountain with full mana)

[C] Consume carried plant to gain Mana. Mature plants only.

If you win, you can continue planting as long as you like!

Version 1.1 Updates:

Tweaked starting Mana, increased Berry value, increased Mushroom value, decreased cost of planting Spinach to encourage players to plant this defensive item and added to it's description in the instructions. Mana bar now flashes when full to better signal the urgency of heading to the fountain. (Thanks to Thoof for their feedback on the difficultly!)
